ehi_save_data_corrupted_desc:
EHI's Save File got corrupted and cannot be loaded
EHI will use default values to avoid crashing
ehi_level_restart_required: A level restart is required for options to take effect
ehi_item_depends_on: Option '$option;' must be enabled in order to work
ehi_language_desc: Changes mod language. To take effect, a level restart is required.
ehi_popup_all_loot_secured: All loot bags have been secured
ehi_preview:
Preview (A map restart is required to take effect)
Red corner indicates where the first tracker is going to appear
ehi_text_scale_desc:
Sets text scale.
This feature is useful for players with modded in-game fonts
ehi_scale_desc: Sets scale of trackers. The higher number the bigger trackers are and vice versa
ehi_vr_scale_desc: Sets scale of trackers in VR. The higher number the bigger trackers are and vice versa
ehi_time_format_desc: Defines how timed tracker should be formated
ehi_tracker_alignment_desc: Defines how trackers should be aligned
ehi_show_tracker_bg_desc:
Shows tracker background
When disabled, the background is hidden and animation is not visible
ehi_show_one_icon_desc:
Shows 1 icon in tracker when enabled
All icons are visible when this option is disabled
ehi_show_mission_trackers_desc:
Shows mission trackers on the screen (e.g.: Van/Heli arrival time, Next objective wait time, etc...)

This option also applies to custom missions
If supported in EHI
ehi_show_unlockables_desc: Shows on the screen tracker for achievements, trophies and daily mission
ehi_show_achievements_desc:
Shows achievements on the screen
Some heists may not have any achievements available
ehi_show_achievements_mission_desc: Shows achievements that can be completed only in heists
ehi_hide_unlocked_achievements_desc:
When enabled, EHI will not show trackers for unlocked achievements (heist)
When disabled, EHI will show all trackers for achievements (heist)
ehi_show_achievements_weapon_desc:
Shows achievements that require you to kill enemies with weapons

The tracker will not be visible once the achievement is unlocked
ehi_show_achievements_melee_desc:
Shows achievements that require you to kill enemies with melee

The tracker will not be visible once the achievement is unlocked
ehi_show_achievements_grenade_desc:
Shows achievements that require you to kill enemies with throwables

The tracker will not be visible once the achievement is unlocked
ehi_show_achievements_vehicle_desc:
Shows achievements that require you to run over enemies with vehicles

The tracker will not be visible once the achievement is unlocked
ehi_show_achievements_other_desc:
Shows achievements that do not belong to any group above

The tracker will not be visible once the achievement is unlocked
ehi_show_achievement_failed_popup_desc: Failed achievements will show as red in the popup
ehi_show_achievement_started_popup_desc: Achievements that are now being tracked will show as green in the popup
ehi_show_trophies_desc:
Shows trophies on the screen
Some heists may not have any trophies available
ehi_hide_unlocked_trophies_desc:
When enabled, EHI will not show trackers for unlocked trophies
When disabled, EHI will show all trackers for trophies
ehi_show_trophy_failed_popup_desc: Failed trophies will show as red in the popup
ehi_show_trophy_started_popup_desc: Trophies that are now being tracked will show as green in the popup
ehi_show_dailies_desc:
Shows dailies on the screen if the are active

Completed dailies won't appear on the screen
ehi_show_daily_failed_popup_desc: Failed dailies will show as red in the popup
ehi_show_daily_started_popup_desc: Dailies that are now being tracked will show as green in the popup
ehi_show_gained_xp_desc:
Shows earned XP in a mission.
This tracker is disabled in Crime Spree.
ehi_xp_format_desc:
Example: Base value: 1000; Death Wish difficulty
Base value only: 1000
Value multiplied with difficulty: 13000
Value multiplied with all XP bonuses: 13000+
ehi_xp_format_all_bonuses: Show value multiplied with all XP bonuses
ehi_xp_panel_1: Show panel for every XP gained
ehi_xp_panel_2: Show total XP gained from the heist
ehi_xp_panel_3: Show popup for every XP gained and total XP
ehi_xp_panel_4: Show hint for every XP gained and total XP
ehi_show_xp_in_mission_briefing_only: Show gained XP in Mission Briefing only
ehi_show_xp_in_mission_briefing_only_des: Enable this function if you want to see XP in Mission Briefing, but not in-game
ehi_total_xp_show_difference_desc:
[Show total XP gained from the heist] option only!
Shows how much you gained XP in a standalone tracker
ehi_show_trade_delay_desc: Shows trade delay when you or your teammates kill a civilian
ehi_show_trade_delay_option_desc:
Always: Always show a tracker when you or your teammate killed a civilian
In Custody: Show a tracker when you or your teammate went to custody and killed atleast 1 civilian
ehi_show_trade_delay_other_players_only: Show Trade Delay Tracker For Other Players Only
ehi_show_trade_delay_other_players_only_: When enabled, this tracker will not show how many civilians you killed but it will still show for other players.
ehi_show_trade_delay_suppress_in_stealth: Don't Show Trade Delay Tracker in Stealth
Hides Trade Delay in stealth when enabled. Once the alarm goes off, the tracker appears with all accumulated delay.
ehi_show_timers_desc: Shows timers for hacking, drilling, sawing, etc...
ehi_show_camera_loop_desc: Shows a tracker when a security camera is looped
ehi_show_enemy_turret_trackers_desc: Shows a tracker when it is reloading or repairing
ehi_show_zipline_timer_desc:
Shows 2 timers for zipline.
First timer shows how long it takes to drop a bag/player, second timer shows zipline reset
ehi_show_gage_tracker_desc:
Shows tracker for Gage Packages on the map.
If the map does not allow Gage Packages, the tracker will not show
ehi_show_captain_damage_reduction_desc: Shows tracker for damage reduction when Captain is present
ehi_show_equipment_tracker_desc: Shows a separate tracker for deployed Doctor Bags, Ammo Bags, Grenade Cases, Body Bags and First Aid Kits
ehi_equipment_format_desc: Defines how equipment should be formated
ehi_show_equipment_doctorbag_desc: Shows a tracker for Doctor Bags
ehi_show_equipment_ammobag_desc: Shows a tracker for Ammo Bags
ehi_show_equipment_grenadecases_desc: Shows a tracker for Grenade Crates
ehi_show_equipment_bodybags_desc:
Shows a tracker for Body Bags
This tracker is removed when alarm sounds
ehi_show_equipment_firstaidkit_desc: Shows a tracker for First Aid Kits
ehi_show_equipment_ecmjammer_desc:
Shows a tracker for the remaining duration of an ECM Jammer
An ECM Jammer with the longest duration is shown in the tracker
ehi_ecmjammer_block_ecm_without_pager_de: Don't show ECM Jammer that won't delay pagers
ehi_show_equipment_ecmfeedback_desc:
Shows a tracker for the remaining duration of an ECM Feedback
An ECM Feedback with the longest duration is shown in the tracker (host only)
ehi_show_equipment_aggregate_health: Aggregate Doctor Bags and First Aid Kits
ehi_show_equipment_aggregate_health_desc: Aggregates Doctor Bags and First Aid Kits into one tracker
ehi_show_equipment_aggregate_all_desc:
Aggregates all deployables into one tracker
Deployables use their respective color from down below
ehi_show_minion_tracker_desc: Shows tracker for how many converted enemies are on the map
ehi_show_minion_per_player: Show Number of Converts Per Player
ehi_show_minion_per_player_desc: Shows in the tracker colored player number of converts
ehi_show_minion_killed_message_desc: Shows a message when your convert has been killed
ehi_show_difficulty_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for how much difficult the wave is
ehi_show_drama_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for accumulated drama (host only)
ehi_show_pager_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for how many pagers you have left
ehi_show_pager_callback_trackers_desc: Shows a tracker for pagers that needs to be answered
ehi_show_enemy_count_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for how many enemies are on the map
ehi_show_enemy_count_show_pagers_desc:
Shows enemies with pager on the left and enemies without the pager on the right
Once alarm sounds, only a number of enemies is visible
ehi_show_laser_tracker_desc: Shows a tracker for lasers that cycle every few seconds
ehi_show_assault_delay_tracker_desc:
Shows a tracker for how long the assault delay will be

The tracker won't show on clients when they drop-in after assault difficulty has been increased
ehi_show_loot_counter_desc: Shows a tracker for how much loot is in heist
ehi_show_all_loot_secured_popup_desc: Shows a popup when all loot on the map has been secured
ehi_variable_random_loot_format_desc:
Defines how additional random loot should be formatted

Example:16 guaranteed bags with 4 safes that may or not have loot; 9 bags secured

Option 1:
9/16-20?

Option 2:
9/20?

Option 3:
9/16+4?
ehi_show_bodybags_counter_desc: Shows a tracker for how many bodybags you have
ehi_show_escape_chance_desc: Shows a tracker with possible escape chance
ehi_show_waypoints_desc: Show waypoints in the game world
ehi_show_waypoints_only_desc:
When enabled and an element has both tracker and waypoint defined, show only the waypoint
Otherwise tracker will be shown
ehi_show_waypoints_present_timer_desc: Sets how long the waypoint will stay on your screen before it will 'move' to its destination
ehi_show_waypoints_enemy_turret_desc: Shows a waypoint on the enemy turret when it is reloading or repairing
ehi_show_waypoints_timers_desc: Shows a waypoint on a visible timer (hacking, drilling, sawing, etc ...)
ehi_show_waypoints_pager_desc: Shows a waypoint on a pager that needs to be answered
ehi_show_waypoints_cameras_desc: Shows a waypoint on a camera that is currently being looped
ehi_show_waypoints_zipline_desc:
Shows a waypoint on a zipline that is in motion
Only the reset time is shown
ehi_show_waypoints_ecmjammer_desc: Shows a waypoint on active ECM Jammer
ehi_show_buffs_desc: Shows on the screen buffs and cooldowns from skills and perks
ehi_buffs_scale_desc: Sets scale of buffs. The higher number the bigger buffs are and vice versa
ehi_buffs_alignment_desc: Defines how buffs should be alignment on the screen
ehi_buffs_shape_desc: Defines what shape the buffs should have on the screen
ehi_buffs_show_progress_desc:
Defines if the progress in the buff should be visible or not
By default, the progress will go clockwise
ehi_buffs_invert_progress_desc:
When enabled, the progress will go counterclockwise
When disabled, the progress will go clockwise
ehi_buffs_skills_mastermind_inspire_basi: Shows cooldown when you inspire someone
ehi_buffs_skills_mastermind_inspire_ace_: Shows inspire cooldown when you revive someone
ehi_buffs_skills_mastermind_uppers_range: Shows a gauge when you are in FAK's autoheal range
Sets how often 'Uppers Range' gauge should be updated per second
ehi_buffs_skills_mastermind_forced_frien: Shows a gauge with current accumulated absorption from Forced Friendship
ehi_buffs_skills_ghost_sixth_sense_marke: Shows a gauge with how many units are currently marked with Sixth Sense
ehi_buffs_skills_fugitive_bloodthirst_ra:
Sets percentual ratio to show Bloodthirst gauge
Setting it to 0% makes the buff always visible

Default value is 34%, which are 6 kills in Vanilla
ehi_buffs_skills_fugitive_berserker_refr: Sets how often 'Berserker' gauge should be updated per second
ehi_buffs_perks_infiltrator_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Infiltrator perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_gambler_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Gambler perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_grinder_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Grinder perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_maniac_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Maniac perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_anarchist_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Anarchist / Armorer perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_biker_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Biker perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_kingpin_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Kingpin perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_sicario_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Sicario perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_stoic_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Stoic perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_tag_team_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Tag Team perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_hacker_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Hacker perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_leech_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Leech perk deck
ehi_buffs_perks_copycat_desc: Shows buffs and cooldowns in Copycat perk deck
ehi_buffs_other_dodge_refresh_desc: Sets how often 'Dodge Chance' gauge should be updated per second
ehi_buffs_other_dodge_persistent_desc: 'Dodge Chance' gauge will stay on your screen when your dodge is lower than 0%
ehi_buffs_other_crit_refresh_desc: Sets how often 'Crit Chance' gauge should be updated per second
ehi_buffs_other_crit_persistent_desc: 'Crit Chance' gauge will stay on your screen when your crit is lower than 0%
ehi_show_inventory_detailed_description_:
Shows detailed description for Throwables and Equipment
A level restart is required to take effect
ehi_bm_doctor_bag_2: Quick Fix: After use, $multiplier less damage for $duration;s
ehi_bm_ammo_bag: Secondary weapon is refilled first, then primary
ehi_bm_ammo_bag_2: Bulletstorm: Unlimited ammo after use for up to %ds (depends on how much ammo have been taken)
ehi_bm_armor_kit:
Packs your selected armor and you start with Two-Piece Suit
After use, you will have your selected armor
After change you cannot switch back to suit
ehi_bm_bodybags_bag: A bodybag can hide one dead body (stealth)
ehi_bm_first_aid_kit_2:
Uppers: Autoheal after you lost all health and you are in FAK's range of %sm
Cooldown: %ds
ehi_bm_grenade_crate: One use restores the amount of throwables up to max
ehi_bm_grenade_crate_2: Does not work with perk deck abilities
ehi_bm_cooldown_drain: Each kill speeds up cooldown by %ss
ehi_bm_fir_com: Explodes first, then releases a fire blast
ehi_bm_concussion_2: After recover, flashed enemies will have %s%s accuracy for %ds
ehi_bm_poison_gas_grenade_1: Explodes first, then releases toxic gas
ehi_bm_kingpin_1: Heals you for %s%s per every damage (active)
ehi_bm_kingpin_2: Nearby enemies will prefer targeting you (active)
ehi_bm_kingpin_3: When below %s%s HP, effect is increased by %s%s (active)
ehi_bm_kingpin_4: If max HP, cooldown is reduced by additional %ss for %s HP gained (active)
ehi_bm_sicario_1: While inside the smoke screen, you and your allies avoid %s%s of all bullets
ehi_bm_sicario_2: Enemies inside the smoke screen have their accuracy reduced by %s%s
ehi_bm_sicario_3: All of your perk deck effects are increased by %s%s while you are in the smoke screen
ehi_bm_sicario_4: Any of your allies inside the smoke screen will gain %s%s dodge chance
ehi_bm_stoic_1: Using the Stoic's Hip Flask negates all pending damage
ehi_bm_stoic_2: If your HP is below %s%s, cooldown will be reduced by %ss for each kill instead of %ss
ehi_bm_tagteam_1: Each enemy you or your tagged unit kills heals you for %sHP and heals them for %sHP (active)
ehi_bm_tagteam_2_a: Each your kill extends the duration by %ss and reduces cooldown by %ss (active)
ehi_bm_tagteam_2_b: Each your kill extends the duration by %ss (active)
ehi_bm_tagteam_2_c: Each your kill reduces cooldown by %ss (active)
ehi_bm_tagteam_2_d: Each your tagged unit kill reduces cooldown by %ss (active)
ehi_bm_tagteam_3:
Each your or tagged unit kill increases absorption by %s up to %s (active)
Resets after deactivation
ehi_bm_hacker_1: Each kill heals you for %dHP (active - loud)
ehi_bm_hacker_2: Temporarily increases dodge when getting a kill: +%s%s for %ss (active)
ehi_bm_hacker_3: Each crew member kill heals them for %dHP (active - loud)
ehi_bm_leech_2: Disables your armor while Leech is active
ehi_bm_leech_3: Each %s kill(s) grants you invulnerability for %ss (active)
ehi_bm_leech_4:
Divides your health into %s segments and killing %s enemies restores 1 segment (active)
Taking damage removes 1 segment
If the damage is over %s, %s segment(s) are removed
ehi_bm_leech_5: You cannot go into bleedout, but if you are out of HP, your movement will slow down by %s%s (active)
ehi_bm_leech_6: You can activate Leech while downed, you will stay alive if you revive a teammate or use a doctor bag and you are above 0 HP
ehi_other_show_remaining_xp: Show Remaining XP to Next Level/Infamy Pool
ehi_other_show_remaining_xp_desc:
Shows Remaining XP
If you are Level 100, remaining XP in your Infamy Pool will be visible, otherwise remaining XP to next level will be visible
A level restart is required to take effect
ehi_other_show_remaining_xp_to_100_desc: Shows Remaining XP to Level 100 (visible if you are under Level 100)
ehi_other_show_mission_xp_overview_desc: Shows a panel in Mission Briefing with possible XP you can get
ehi_experience_toy_found: Timboy found (If in a shopping bag)
ehi_experience_watchdogs_bonus_xp: Bonus XP for each bag after securing 3 mandatory bags
ehi_experience_mus_no_gas_trap_stealth: No gas trap in The Diamond chamber (Stealth)
ehi_experience_mus_no_gas_trap_loud: No gas trap in The Diamond chamber (Loud)
ehi_experience_the_bomb_call_captain: Captain called to move the ship
ehi_experience_scarface_made_a_call: Made a call to meet Sosa
ehi_experience_counterfeit_printed_money: Bonus XP for each printed counterfeit money
ehi_experience_gs_drill_open_store: Opened locked store with a drill
ehi_experience_lab_rats_safe_event_1: Safe event done and received money and jewelry
ehi_experience_lab_rats_safe_event_2: Safe event done and received paintings and coke
ehi_experience_lab_rats_safe_event_3: Safe event done and received other loot
ehi_experience_rvd1_escorted_pink: Escorted Mr. Pink to the warehouse
ehi_experience_breakin_feds_lure: Lured Garrett out of his office
ehi_experience_henrys_rock_first_mission: First mission bag put on conveyor belt
ehi_experience_henrys_rock_drilled_archa: Drilled the metallic door in the Archaelogy lab
ehi_experience_henrys_rock_weapon_fired: Weapon fired in the Weapons lab
